originalText.text: We loved our stay at The Ivy! The place is amazing — very spacious (especially for New York!), thoughtfully-designed, and stocked with all of the essentials. We had plenty of space to sleep, eat, exercise, relax. Beds were comfortable and bedrooms were super quiet. Also great location — charming neighborhood and close to express transit. The host was great as well! Would stay again!

text.text: We loved our stay at The Ivy! The place is amazing — very spacious (especially for New York!), thoughtfully-designed, and stocked with all of the essentials. originalText.text:
I loved my stay at the Ivy! Julisa, the host, was very responsive and ensured I had everything I needed to feel right at home. From modern appliances to bright, spacious living spaces, the Ivy checked every box. As an added bonus, the apartment is just a short walk to the A express train, so I was able to easily commute downtown.

I can’t recommend this property enough and look forward to my next visit!

originalText.text: If you're looking for a long-term stay and want to explore hidden gems in Washington Heights, look no further—this is the place! You are steps away from High Bridge Park, the renowned United Palace Theatre, and a number of options for authentic Dominican food (highly recommend Malecón and La Casa del Mofongo). The Ivy offers a comfortable experience for all guests and the host Julisa is very responsive to inquiries. My favorite part of the house is the furnished patio, which makes for a perfect spot for small gatherings or just to simply get some fresh air. Without a doubt, this is the place where you want to be to make the most out of your stay!

originalText.text: This is an amazing place ! A lot of space, beautiful decoration and great location !! Loved our stay there and thank you so much for having us! Definitely would love to stay there again during my next trip to NYC :)
